unnormalised: Sorry, I am unable to translate to Konkani as it is not supported.
normalised: Tor, konkani mon’xan mhaka Bharataiek bhonvddechi yeuzonn korchea vixim vicharlem, khas korun hotel-am bhuuk korpachea ani address-am sodun kaddpachea avhannanchea vixim. Tem mhaka mhojem poilem dukhnachem vellachea vixim zata, jitlea vellar hanv deshant bore bhaxen bhonvonk laglem. Thodde koxttan mellil’le ginean vanttun ghevonk mhaka dislem!

Hanv zankam mellil’lim soglleant vhoddlim problem-am tim Bharatache address sodun kaddpache asle. Te hamxem asonch sarall nant, je bhaxen U-S vo U-K-nt astole. Tuka “Ghorachem number bara teenan vanttlam, chouthi voll, Hanuman Mandirachea lagim, Ameerpet, Hyderabad – panch lakh ani solla” hem kitem tori distolem ani tujem G-P-S aple hath uchllttolem! Ani tench ek sarall astolem!

Bangalore-ant mhojem poilem vhoddlem bhonvdllem dukhnem ghoddlem. Hanvem M-G Road-achea lagim ek hotel bhuuk kel’lem, khas korun address “hash tees don, Barton Centre, M-G Road, Bangalore, Karnataka, panch lakh satt hazar ani ek” mhonn dakhovnn kel’li. Sarall puro, khorem nhoi? Chukichem! Auto-rickshaw cholovnnean mhaka *chukichea* Barton Centre-ant vhelem. Distea bhaxen Bangalore-ant ek-ekantle chodd asat… konnank kitlem koll’llem? Thoddea ghontean tras-trasache phone korchea ani vaddonk vochpi trasam (ani auto-cher kharch kel’lea chodd rupeachea) uprant, hanvem nimannech xarti mellovnk pavlem. Dislem te bhaxen, hanvem tench metro station-ache *virudh* vo “Citibank A-T-M-chea lagim” hem vivran vapurunk zai aslem je hanvem fuddem Google-ant sodlem. Xikovnn mell’lli: dislam-te confirm korat!

Uprant Jaipur-ant ek vell aslo. Hotel confirm korpachem email mhonnlem, “Hotel Raj Mahal, C dash don, M-I Road, Jaipur, Rajasthan, teen lakh don hazar ani ek.” Eka tharavik bhaxen aikonk yeta, punn M-I Road lamb aslo! Ani “C dash don” kitem tori zanv yeta. Nimannem tem sodun kaddpacho ekuch marg mhonnlear hotel-ak phone korop ani *lagichea* dislam-te vicharop. “Panch Batti circle uprant petrol pump-achea lagim,” te mhonnle. Tem kamak ailem.

Ani ek trick hanvem xikleli mhonnlear pin code-ak SODANCH don pavtti tankhun ghevnk zai. Typo-an tuka mail-am poros pois vhoronk zata, khas korun Delhi vo Mumbai bhaxen vhodd xaranchi vadd zaupi xar-amni. Gurgaon-ant chukichea *sector*-ant vochonk pavlleachem kalpnik tor zai! Ek vell, pincode-achem nimnnem ankddo “eka” vorvim chukil’lean hanv ekdom’ Chennai-chea dusrea bhagak vhoronk laglem… s lakh ani ek zatolem, mhojem mhonn’nem s lakh ani don aschem aslem.

Ani online bhuuk korop? Bhonvddech web site-ancher dakhovllea address-ancher andhle bhaxen vixvas dovrunk naka. Tankam satyai korun gheiat. Direkt hotel-ak phone korat. Dislam-te confirm korat. *Thollavea* utrant address vicharat. G-P-S-ak “Corporation Bank virudh” samzonk mellchonam, punn thollaveak melltolem. Ani, thodde basic Hindi vo thollave bhas xikat. “Paas mein” (lagim) ani “seedha jao” (saral vochonk) zann’nen jiv divonk xokta.

Tor, mhaka dixem mhonnlear: toyar ravat, dhir dhorat, ani sodanch modot vicharat. Bharatachi otitheo svikarpachi khup bori aslo; lok sarvolekh bhaxen tuka marg dikhovnk toyar astat, tem korunk tankam aplea margan pois vochonk poddlear tori. Fuddem ghevnk tanko ani teen pavtti tanko hem address! Ani sogllech voll fail zalear, lagichem chai stall sodun kadd, ani address vichar. Eka boro kap chai ani thollavea gineanank Bharataiek sogllea bhonvddent problem uklad’tat. Address normalize zatolem mhonn apekxa dovrunk naka.
